# Bursitis

<i>Trochanteric bursitis</i> has been historically cited as the cause of lateral hip pain but recent studies suggest <i>gluteal tendinopathy</i> is a more likely caused and must be ruled out first [@aptaCurrentConceptsOrthopaedic2024; @grimaldiGlutealTendinopathyIntegrating2015].
